description: TYPO3 v12 Composer Installation with Custom Web Directory - Extensions ONLY in vendor directory

news.reason: Should find example/news or georgringer/news in vendor directory

powermail.reason: Should find example/powermail in vendor directory

custom_tools.reason: Should NOT find - located in invalid web/typo3conf/ext location (Composer mode ignores this)

site_package.reason: Should NOT find - located in invalid web/typo3conf/ext location (Composer mode ignores this)

notes: TYPO3 v12 Composer installation with custom web-dir 'web'
In Composer mode, extensions MUST be in vendor directory only
Extensions in web/typo3conf/ext are completely ignored in Composer mode
Extension Manager cannot install extensions in Composer mode
